ygData.subject: Re: Cindra's Charismatic Carrilon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s how I bought Thicken and Crystallize Mana spells for some enchanter friends (Carrilon+sneak).  I m thinking with all this talk of the camp, now
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Jan 2000 kim@... wrote:

> At L42, I tried Carrilon on the brownie guards. Took them
> from threatening to dubious. I then waltzed into the village
> and looked around. The merchants wouldn't sell to me. I
> could've tried the sneak trick, but didn't want to risk it
> somehow making me KOS to the guards again.

That's how I bought Thicken and Crystallize Mana spells for some enchanter
friends (Carrilon+sneak). I'm thinking with all this talk of the camp,
now might be a good time to see if it's worth a high level group's effort
to break and hold for experience (given the crowding of solB/lguk).

Congrats on the EBW, I've been wanting one for some time. My guild leader
(50 druid) has one of the teeth, and said if I could get the other he'd
let me have it, but finding a group that's willing to go with me in is
rather difficult. Of course the druid also knows how to solo both maid
and butler rooms, but he's not up for spending the time it takes to get
another fang (i.e. luck was vastly on your side with the drops).

If only bardic starfire could be cast less than once a day..

Athren Notechaser, final movement of 44th composition
Cazic-Thule
